CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 24, 1955, pg. 5, reads: "'For Last Ride' - Pallbearers carry the body of Mrs. Gladys Marie Nowlin from Hopewell Funeral Home "for last ride" to cemetery. Mrs. Nowlin was fatally stabbed Friday night.  Witnesses say that she was pushed from a black Ford sedan on Hazelwood Avenue. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men escorting women out of Hopewell Funeral Home for funeral of Gladys Marie Nowlin, 7609 Tioga Street, Homewood
